Title: Freemium Portfolio Limits
Description: Free users track 10 assets, premium gets unlimited. Keeps beginners engaged while incentivizing upgrade

Title: Tiered Price Alerts
Description: Free users get 3 active price alerts, premium gets unlimited custom alerts with SMS/email

Title: Tax Season Premium Package
Description: $29-49 one-time seasonal package for tax report generation (Jan-April). High conversion period, doesn't require subscription commitment

Title: Delayed vs Real-Time Data
Description: Free tier shows 15-minute delayed prices, premium gets real-time. Standard industry practice

Title: Historical Data Paywall
Description: Free users see 30-day price history, premium unlocks full historical charts and data

Title: Crypto Certification Program
Description: 'Bitcoin Investments Certified Beginner' badge after completing course + quiz. $29-49 one-time fee. Shareable credential for LinkedIn/social

Title: Sponsored Exchange Placements
Description: Exchanges pay for 'Featured' or 'Recommended' badges in comparison engine. Clear disclosure with 'Sponsored' label. $500-2000/month per placement

Title: Premium Discord/Community Access
Description: Exclusive Discord server for premium members with market discussions, expert Q&A, and early alpha. Strong retention driver

Title: Ad-Free Premium Perk
Description: Include ad-free browsing as premium benefit. Creates dual revenue: free users see ads, premium pays subscription

Title: Advisor/Enterprise Tier
Description: $49-99/month tier for financial advisors to use platform with clients. Includes white-label reports, multi-client dashboards, compliance features

Title: Affiliate Influencer Program
Description: Let crypto YouTubers/bloggers earn commission referring users. 20-30% revenue share. They promote, you acquire users at zero upfront cost

Title: Gift Subscriptions
Description: Allow purchasing premium as gift for others. Great for holidays, popular in education space

Title: Premium Export Formats
Description: Free users get basic CSV export. Premium gets formatted PDF reports, Excel with charts, direct tax software integration

Title: Backtesting Tool (Premium)
Description: 'What if I had invested $X in BTC 5 years ago?' tool. Free gets basic, premium gets advanced multi-asset backtesting with DCA simulation

Title: AI Portfolio Analysis (Premium)
Description: Claude-powered portfolio review: risk assessment, diversification score, rebalancing suggestions. High perceived value, uses existing AI infra

Title: Sponsored Learning Paths
Description: Exchanges sponsor educational content (e.g., 'Coinbase Beginner Path'). They pay for branded content, users get free education. Win-win

Title: Priority Support Tier
Description: Free users get community forum support. Premium gets email support with 24hr response. Creates clear value differentiation

Title: Watchlist Limits
Description: Free users can watchlist 5 coins, premium gets unlimited. Low friction upgrade path

Title: Monthly Performance Report (Premium)
Description: Auto-generated monthly PDF: portfolio performance, market summary, personalized insights. Delivered via email. High retention value

Title: Crypto Course Marketplace
Description: Partner with crypto educators to sell courses on platform. Take 20-30% commission. Curated quality control keeps trust

Title: Pay-Per-Report Research
Description: Individual deep-dive coin research reports for $5-15 each. Alternative to subscription for casual users

Title: Consultation Marketplace
Description: Connect beginners with verified crypto consultants for paid 1:1 sessions. Platform takes 15-20% cut. Vet consultants carefully

Title: Annual Plan Discount
Description: Offer 2 months free on annual subscription ($99/year vs $9.99/month). Improves cash flow and reduces churn

Title: Student/Nonprofit Discount
Description: 50% discount for students and nonprofits. Builds goodwill, captures future high-earners early

Title: Custom Dashboard Widgets (Premium)
Description: Free users get standard dashboard. Premium can customize layout, add widgets, create multiple dashboard views
